name: Classic Apple Pie
description: A delicious and traditional apple pie recipe that everyone will love.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix 2 cups of flour and salt.
Cut in the cold butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Gradually add ice water, mixing until the dough holds together.
Divide the dough in half, shape into discs, and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Peel, core, and slice the apples. Mix with sugar, remaining flour, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Roll out one dough disc and place it in a 9-inch pie dish. Trim the edges.
Roll out the second dough disc and place it on top. Trim and seal the edges.
Cut slits in the top crust for ventilation.
Bake at 425Â°F for 45 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
notes: Serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
author: Grandma's Kitchen

reviews.comment: This is the best apple pie recipe I've ever tried!
Delicious pie, just like my grandma used to make.
